attributes.action: Get full recognition in the Queens Honour List for Barry Albin Dyer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see Barry Albin Dyer who is an undertaker who is a very hard working person and charity minded.Community work. Who is bringing back our war heros get an honour  from the queen for everything he does.
get Barry Albin Dyer an honour in the queens honour list.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
